description.plain:
Brian Todd Collins (born April 1, 1986), better known by his stage name Kid Ink, is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, and former record producer.

He is signed to RCA Records. He released the independent album Up & Away, an EP titled Almost Home, his second studio album My Own Lane, his third studio album Full Speed and his fourth Summer In The Winter. The latter spawned the successful singles “Show Me,” “Iz U Down,” and “Main Chick.” On February 3, 2015, he released his third studio album Full Speed, which spawned the successful singles “Body Language.” “Hotel,” and “Be Real.”

He is most known for his acclaimed bangers “Money And The Power” and “Sunset.”

body.plain:
Brian Todd Collins (born April 1, 1986), better known by his stage name Kid Ink, is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, and former record producer.

He is signed to RCA Records. He released the independent album Up & Away, an EP titled Almost Home, his second studio album My Own Lane, his third studio album Full Speed and his fourth Summer In The Winter. The latter spawned the successful singles “Show Me,” “Iz U Down,” and “Main Chick.” On February 3, 2015, he released his third studio album Full Speed, which spawned the successful singles “Body Language.” “Hotel,” and “Be Real.”

He is most known for his acclaimed bangers “Money And The Power” and “Sunset.”

songs.full_title: Show Me by Kid Ink (Ft. Chris Brown)
songs.title: Show Me

description.plain:
The DJ Mustard-produced track features heavy 808s, the regular Mustard “chant” on top of a re-pitched sample of Robin S’s 1997 track, “Show Me Love”. Featuring Chris Brown, “Show Me” is the perfect mix, with radio-friendly verses, a catchy hook and on point production. This song is the point where Ink’s “mainstream” career began to kick off, and he began to receive radio play.

“Show Me” marks the first collaboration between Mustard and Kid Ink. However, it was the start of a powerful trio of high-charting songs, along with “Main Chick”. Mustard breaks down the production on “Show Me” here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FIXJcmcnnhg

The chorus on the track was written by TeeFlii. He discussed the chorus in an interview with Hot 97.

songs.embed_content: Read “Show Me” by Kid Ink on Genius

songs.full_title: Promise by Kid Ink (Ft. Fetty Wap)
songs.title: Promise

description.plain:
On ”Promise,” Kid Ink lets his girl know that he’s committed and Fetty Wap backs him up on the hook. The song is likely directed at Kid Ink’s fiancée and girlfriend of ten years, Asiah Azante.

DJ Mustard is on production duty for “Promise,” lending the track his signature bass-heavy, rachet flair.

”Promise” is off Kid Ink’s fourth studio album Summer in the Winter, which he surprised his fans with on Christmas 2015—Mustard also served as Executive Producer for the album.

songs.full_title: Be Real by Kid Ink (Ft. DeJ Loaf)
songs.title: Be Real

description.plain:
Nearing the February 3rd release of Ink’s upcoming junior album Full Speed, another leak has surfaced. This time wielding a feature from DeJ Loaf, utilizing her angelic voice on the hook.

“Be Real” serves as the 5th leak off the album along with “Cool Back”, “Blunted”, “Hotel”, and “Like A Hott Boyy”.



On March 31, 2015, the official music video was released.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7TvfG6IzBa0
